title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted reddish brown silk ornamented with cut steel beads in pattern of diagonal bars and crosses.  Two steel rings control side opening; beaded tassels at either end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crochet. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-43.
